Name:
MTB-23
Viscolul
TK-955
Fate:
Sold to Romania
Captured by the Soviet Union
Returned to Romania, later scrapped
Operations:
Action of 9 July 1941
Siege of Odessa
Propulsion: 3 Isotta-Fraschini petrol engines, 2 shafts, 3,450 horse power
Armament:
2 x quadruple 7.7 mm machine guns 
2 x 533 mm torpedo tubes
8 depth charges or 4 mines
